import Card from "react-bootstrap/Card"; import Container from "react-bootstrap/Container"; import Row from "react-bootstrap/Row"; import Col from "react-bootstrap/Col"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { apiCategories } from "../../rtk/slices/categoriesSlice"; const Categories = () => { const categories = useSelector((state) => state.categories); const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(apiCategories()); }, [dispatch]); return ( <> {/*

Categories

{categories.map((category) => ( {category.categoryName} ))} */}

); }; export default Categories;
